channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Qradar Advisor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Qradar Advisor

item.title: CVE-2021-20380|2024-08-03T17:37:24.237Z -- ibm -- qradar%20advisor
item.description: IBM QRadar Advisor With Watson App 1.1 through 2.5 as used on IBM QRadar SIEM 7.4 could allow a remote user to obtain sensitive information from HTTP requests that could aid in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 195712.
